additionalfeatures: Sleek and Easy to Use, Battery Life: 1080p (30 Fps) Upto 3 Hrs, Mounts (a Variety of Mounts let Firmly Lock the Camera in Position, Virtually, Curved, Flat Deck and Dash Mounts to Handlebar, Helmet, Shoulder and Multi-use Strap Mounts, Mounts Have Interlocking Joints That Grip in Place Instead of Relying Solely on Tension, Anti-Vibration Locking Performance, Adapter to use Virb with Other Industry Mounts), Rugged, Durable and Water Resistant (Ipx7) with an Aerodynamic Design
contents: Battery, Mini USB Cable, Owner Manual, Cradle, Mounting Kits and Extension Adaptor
othersportsandactioncamerafeatures: Video and Photographs at the Same Time, Oregon and Edge as Remote Controls, Virb Uses Ant+ Wireless Connectivity can use Compatible Garmin Device Such as Fenix, Image Stabilization: Digital
otherresolution: HD Video: 1080p (1920 x 1080) at 30 Fps, 720p (1280 x 720) at 30 fps / 60 Fps, Still Photo Resolution: 16 m (4664 x 3496), 8 m (3264 x 2448), 960p (1280 x 960) at 48 Fps, 12 m (4664 x 2632), WVGA (Slow Motion): 848 480 at 120 fps
name: Garmin VIRB HD Sports & Action Camera
